contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox radio station | name = XEHI | image = | city = [[Ciudad Miguel Alemán]] | area = [[Ciudad Miguel Alemán]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Puro Cañonazo | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 1470 AM | format = | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = | webcast = | website = [http://www.miradioonline.com.mx/ miradioonline.com.mx] | affiliations = }} '''XEHI''' (branded as Puro Cañonazo) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] AM [[radio station]] that serves the [[Ciudad Miguel Alemán]], [[Tamaulipas]] area. ==External links== * {{AM station data|XEHI}} * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio / television stations] {{Ciudad Miguel Aleman Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Ciudad Miguel Aleman]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1987]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
